attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the conservative party and reform the voting system.
attributes.additional_details: It's starting with the nhs and Jeremy Hunt, next the cuts to disability Allowance taking from the people who need it most whilst they all receive a £10,000 pay rise.
attributes.background:
Over half the people who live in the country didn't vote for the party in power.

It's the people like us who didn't vote conservative that are going to suffer.

If they are left in power for the full five years things will only get worse.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament can't hold a vote of no confidence on political parties. You might be interested in signing the following petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106407
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121810
